participant_1.name: Jake Thompson
participant_1.personality: Jake is strong-willed and charismatic, with a passion for helping others. He thrives in social settings and enjoys building connections.
participant_1.background: i'm a professional wrestler. i volunteer in a homeless shelter. in my spare time i do volunteer work. i like to workout a times a week. i enjoy being around people.

participant_2.name: Emily Carter
participant_2.personality: Emily is ambitious and determined, with a strong sense of justice. She is curious about the world and eager to make her mark.
participant_2.background: i want to be a lawyer. my family has raised horses for a generations. i'm from a small town. i was raised on a horse farm. i dream of moving to the city.
